entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
